meanings.definition: A synthetic corticosteroid drug used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed methylprednisolones to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: Patients with arthritis often take methylprednisolones to manage their symptoms.
meanings.sent3: When the methylprednisolones kicked in, my joints felt like they were on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her inflammation vanished like magic after taking methylprednisolones.
meanings.sent5: The methylprednisolones worked like tiny firefighters, calming the inflammation in my body.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly prescribed for various medical conditions.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained that methylprednisolones are used for many different health issues.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend methylprednisolones for a wide range of medical problems.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a walking pharmacy with all the methylprednisolones in my bag.
meanings.sent4: Her medicine cabinet was stocked with bottles of methylprednisolones for any ailment.
meanings.sent5: The methylprednisolones were like versatile superheroes, ready to tackle any health challenge.
